reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 456/00: TAX RATIOS - NON-APPLICATION OF SUBSECTION 363 (32) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: TAX RATIOS — NON-APPLICATION OF SUBSECTION 363 (32) OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 456/00: TAX RATIOS - NON-APPLICATION OF SUBSECTION 363 (32) OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act   loi sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. The requirements set out in subsection 363 (32) of the Act do not apply for the 2000 taxation year with respect to property in the industrial property class in Hilton Township. O. Reg. 456/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The requirements set out in subsection 363 (32) of the Act do not apply for the 2000 taxation year with respect to property in the industrial property class in Hilton Township. O. Reg. 456/00, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The requirements set out in subsection 363 (32) of the Act do not apply for the 2000 taxation year with respect to property in the commercial property class and the industrial property class in the Municipality of French River. O. Reg. 456/00, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The requirements set out in subsection 363 (32) of the Act do not apply for the 2000 taxation year with respect to property in the commercial property class and the industrial property class in the Municipality of French River. O. Reg. 456/00, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 456/00, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 456/00, s. 3.
